subject: Research Paper Submission - AI Email Agent
body:
Dear Dr. Miller,

Please find attached my research paper on 'Prompt-Driven Email Productivity Using Large Language Models'.

I've incorporated the feedback from our last discussion and added a new section on RAG implementation.

Looking forward to your review.

Best regards,
Asneem Athar Shaik

subject: Re: Training Session Confirmation
body:
Hi,

Thank you for the invitation. I confirm my attendance for the training session on December 3rd.

Please let me know if there's anything I need to prepare beforehand.

Best regards,
Asneem

subject: Weekly Status Update - Sprint 23
body:

subject: API Rate Limit Query
body:
Hello,

I'm developing an email productivity application using the Gemini API and experiencing rate limit issues on the free tier.

Could you please clarify:
1. What is the daily request limit?
2. Is there a way to increase the quota for educational projects?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Asneem Athar Shaik
VIT-AP University

subject: Re: Happy Birthday! üéÇ
body:
Thank you so much Mom and Dad! ‚ù§Ô∏è

Your wishes mean everything to me. I'm so grateful for all your support.

I'll call you later today!

Love,
Asneem

subject: Application for Software Engineering Internship
body:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineering Internship position at Microsoft.

As a B.Tech student at VIT-AP University specializing in AI/ML, I have developed several projects including an AI-powered email productivity agent.

I have attached my resume and portfolio for your review.

Thank you for considering my application.

Best regards,
Asneem Athar Shaik
